__e: Salem is the dust he shook from his feet when he turned around and walked away, and he ain't never coming back!
Salem is clearly well on its way to hell on earth.
Oh. They think Salem's gone mad, too?
I'm leaving Salem, and I am never coming back.
Living in Salem and not believing in witches is like living in London and not believing in fog. It is to deny what is right in front of you.
Is there anything we can do? I will do whatever is in my power to protect Salem...
